data.name: Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran
data.oracle_text: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

data.name: Boros Guildmage
data.oracle_text:
{1}{R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
{1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

data.name: Boros Recruit
data.oracle_text:
({R/W} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.)
First strike
data.flavor_text:
"Look at this goblin, once wild, untamed, and full of idiocy. The Boros have given him the skill of a soldier and focused his heart with a single cause."
—Razia

data.name: Boros Swiftblade
data.flavor_text: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

data.name: Brightflame
data.oracle_text: Radiance — Brightflame deals X damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
data.flavor_text:
"Let the pyres of the unbelievers light our way."
—Razia

data.name: Firemane Angel
data.oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
{6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

data.name: Flame-Kin Zealot
data.oracle_text: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.

data.name: Lightning Helix
data.oracle_text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

data.name: Master Warcraft
data.oracle_text:
Cast Master Warcraft only before attackers are declared.
You choose which creatures attack this turn.
You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

data.name: Rally the Righteous
data.oracle_text: Radiance — Untap target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. Those creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Yuri took up the ragged Boros banner, and his brethren, inspired by the act, followed him back into the fight.

data.name: Razia, Boros Archangel
data.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
{T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
data.flavor_text: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

data.name: Razia's Purification
data.oracle_text: Each player chooses three permanents he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.
data.flavor_text: Only the chosen ones are spared.

data.name: Searing Meditation
data.oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
data.flavor_text:
"When I meditate I see the world as it should be. All that does not fit, I remove."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

data.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
data.flavor_text:
"I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead."
—Razia

data.name: Sunhome Enforcer
data.oracle_text:
Whenever Sunhome Enforcer deals combat damage, you gain that much life.
{1}{R}: Sunhome Enforcer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Law soothed his savage heart. Where fury once burned, the enduring flame of order now shines."
—Razia

data.name: Thundersong Trumpeter
data.oracle_text: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome! Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound!"
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire
